Here is a PR which updates `portal_*Ping` to expose ping extensions to the user

This will be beneficial for 
- letting users utilize ping extensions
- testing that common ping extensions work through Hive

One of the primary goals of this PR was making it so we wouldn't need to specify new json-rpc endpoints for every new extension instead opting for a dynamic approach

[Update ping rpc with ping extension support  #369](<https://github.com/ethereum/portal-network-specs/pull/369>)

If people could take a look that would be cool
